dialogue.speaker: Aria Bluefin
dialogue.line: Hi, I am Aria Bluefin. I saw you two collecting garbage effectively. Can you collect 40 garbage in order to save our habitat?

dialogue.speaker: Zed
dialogue.line: We are trying to save the sea by collecting garbage. So you donâ€™t have to beg for our help.

dialogue.speaker: Aria Bluefin
dialogue.line: Really? We merfolks are very thankful for your kindness. Is there any way that I can help you two?

dialogue.speaker: Deemo
dialogue.line: How about information? Did you recently see any strange objects in the ocean?

dialogue.speaker: Aria Bluefin
dialogue.line: Now that you mention it, I encountered a very hot object in some parts of this area.

dialogue.speaker: Deemo
dialogue.line: Hot? Maybe it is a part of my spaceship and landed recently. Thank you for your guidance.

dialogue.speaker: Aria Bluefin
dialogue.line: May Neptune bless the journey of you two.
